nodes.text: The BSX-5 Dreadnaught was a specialized version of the Harrower-class dreadnought that served the Sith Empire during the Cold War.

The most famous BSX-5 was the Dominator, flagship of Darth Jadus. It was blown up while the Sith Lord was traveling in it and Jadus was believed to have perished in the explosion. While tracking down Vyord Yanol, one of Darth Jadus's servants, an Imperial Agent accessed a classified document on his computer, detailing the Dominator's blueprints.
